homeContent.lead: Gen Group Kazakhstan implements modern greenhouse projects for growing fruits and berries, applying advanced technologies and international expertise
homeContent.banana_description: Our greenhouses in Turkestan region are unique in the country. Within 6–9 months after planting we harvested hundreds of tons: the first harvest was about 385 tons of bananas, and the second harvest exceeded 500 tons.
homeContent.banana_notes: The greenhouse is equipped with climate control and adaptive feeding systems, ensuring high quality and year-round production.
homeContent.revenue_growth: Company revenue grew from 0.9 billion KZT in 2022 to 4.4 billion KZT in 2024. This confirms the development dynamics and effectiveness of our projects.

about.title: About
about.lead: A subsidiary of the Turkish GENGROUP, applying international experience and innovation
about.mission: Gen Group Kazakhstan was founded in 2022 as a subsidiary of the Turkish GENGROUP. We apply the technologies of our affiliated companies to build a sustainable and efficient agribusiness.
about.leadership: Under the leadership of CEO and founder Sabyrzhan Uteshev, our team of experts implements innovations, including acclimatization of lemons and dates to new climatic conditions.
about.revenue_explain: Demonstrates the development dynamics and effectiveness of our projects
about.team_description: Our team combines the international experience of the Turkish GENGROUP with deep understanding of the local market and climatic conditions of Kazakhstan. We demonstrate the ability to adapt and cultivate exotic crops, opening new opportunities for the region.
